title: Single select autocomplete
description: Allows merchants to select from a predefined list of options. Itâ€™s typically used when there are a large number of options to choose from.

title: Multi-select autocomplete
description: Allows the merchant to select multiple options from a pre-defined list of options.

title: Multi-select autocomplete with vertical content
description: Allows the merchant to select multiple options from a pre-defined list of options. Selected options are displayed as inline vertical content in the TextField.

title: Autocomplete with loading
description: Use to indicate loading state to merchants while option data is processing.
